mapper.select: select member_no as memberNo, member_email as memberEmail, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_hbd as memberHbd, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_img as memberImg, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_time as memberTime, member_level as memberLevel, member_status as memberStatus, member_intro as memberIntro, member_field as memberField, member_skill as memberSkill, member_school as memberSchool, member_major as memberMajor, member_grade as memberGrade, member_date as memberDate from member where member_email = #{memberEmail} and member_pw = #{memberPw} and member_level=2

select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_content as noticeContent, notice_date as noticeDate, notice_view_count as noticeViewCount from notice where notice_no = #{noticeNo}

select * from(select rownum as rnum, n.* from (select member_no as memberNo, member_email as memberEmail, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_hbd as memberHbd, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_img as memberImg, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_time as memberTime, member_level as memberLevel, member_status as memberStatus, member_intro as memberIntro, member_field as memberField, member_skill as memberSkill, member_school as memberSchool, member_major as memberMajor, member_grade as memberGrade, member_date as memberDate from member where member_status=2 or member_status = 0 order by member_no desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select * from(select rownum as rnum, n.* from (select member_no as memberNo, member_email as memberEmail, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_hbd as memberHbd, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_img as memberImg, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_time as memberTime, member_level as memberLevel, member_status as memberStatus, member_intro as memberIntro, member_field as memberField, member_skill as memberSkill, member_school as memberSchool, member_major as memberMajor, member_grade as memberGrade, member_date as memberDate from member where member_status=2 order by member_no desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select * from(select rownum as rnum, n.* from (select member_no as memberNo, member_email as memberEmail, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_hbd as memberHbd, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_img as memberImg, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_time as memberTime, member_level as memberLevel, member_status as memberStatus, member_intro as memberIntro, member_field as memberField, member_skill as memberSkill, member_school as memberSchool, member_major as memberMajor, member_grade as memberGrade, member_date as memberDate from member where member_status=1 order by member_no desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) as cnt from member where member_status = 2 or member_status = 0
select count(*) as cnt from member where member_status = 2
select count(*) as cnt from member where member_status = 1
select count(*) as cnt from member
select count(*) as level0Cnt from member where member_level = 0
select count(*) as level1Cnt from member where member_level = 1
select count(*) as adminNoticeCnt from notice
select count(*) as level2Cnt from member where member_level = 2
select count(*) as adminQnaCnt from qna
select count(*) as sCnt from sell
select count(*) as rCnt from request
select count(*) as eCnt from employ
select count(*) as sellCnt from sell
select count(*) as sellListCnt from sell where sell_appro = 1
select count(*) as sellListCnt from sell where sell_writer = #{memberNo}
select count(*) as pickListCnt from pick where member_no = #{memberNo}
select count(*) as sellApprovalCnt from sell where sell_appro = 0
select count(*) as requestApprovalCnt from request where request_appro = 0
select count(*) as requestCnt from request where request_appro = 1
select count(*) as employCnt from EMPLOY

select member_no as memberNo, member_email as memberEmail, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_hbd as memberHbd, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_img as memberImg, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_time as memberTime, member_level as memberLevel, member_status as memberStatus, member_intro as memberIntro, member_field as memberField, member_skill as memberSkill, member_school as memberSchool, member_major as memberMajor, member_grade as memberGrade, member_date as memberDate from member where member_no = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_status = 2 WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}
UPDATE notice SET notice_view_count = notice_view_count+1 WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
UPDATE sell SET sell_status = 1 WHERE sell_no = #{sellNo}
UPDATE request SET request_appro = 1 WHERE request_no = #{requestNo}
UPDATE request SET request_appro = 2 WHERE request_no = #{requestNo}
UPDATE request SET request_status = 2 WHERE request_no = #{requestNo}
UPDATE request SET request_status = 0 WHERE request_no = #{requestNo}
UPDATE sell SET sell_status = 0 WHERE sell_no = #{sellNo}
UPDATE member SET member_status = 0 WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}
UPDATE member SET member_status = 1 WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}
UPDATE sell SET sell_status = 2 WHERE sell_no = #{sellNo}
UPDATE sell SET sell_appro = 1 WHERE sell_no = #{sellNo}
mapper.select: select sell_price as sellPrice, option_title as optionTitle, option_price as optionPrice from sell LEFT JOIN orders ON (sell_no = order_board_no) LEFT JOIN order_option using (order_no) LEFT JOIN options using (option_no) where order_board_type = 0 order by sell_price desc

select sum(sellPrice) as sellPrice, sum(optionPrice) as optionPrice, sellWriter from (select sell_price as sellPrice, option_title as optionTitle, option_price as optionPrice, sell_writer as sellWriter from sell LEFT JOIN orders ON (sell_no = order_board_no) LEFT JOIN order_option using (order_no) LEFT JOIN options using (option_no) where order_board_type = 0 order by sell_price desc) group by sellWriter
select request_price as requestPrice from request LEFT JOIN orders ON (request_no = order_board_no) where order_board_type = 1 order by request_price desc

select sum(requestPrice) as requestPrice, requestResMembers from (select request_price as requestPrice, request_writer as requestWriter, to_number(request_res_members) as requestResMembers, request_no as requestNo from request LEFT JOIN orders ON (request_no = order_board_no) where order_board_type = 1 and request_status =2 order by request_price desc) group by requestResMembers

select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_content as noticeContent, notice_date as noticeDate, notice_view_count as noticeViewCount from notice where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
